channel.title: Embedded Finance on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded Finance on CEO Playbook

item.title: The Future of Finance: All About Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An overview of how Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance are converging to reshape the global financial landscape.

item.title: Assured
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Insurtech platform that aggregates protection products from top carriers like Chubb, PGA Sompo, and Etiqa, allowing any digital channel to embed insurance coverage via a single API.

item.title: Sentro
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: UBX-backed e-commerce platform that empowers over 30,000 Filipino merchants to build their own online stores for free, featuring integrated payments, logistics, and financing.

item.title: XLog
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Digital logistics platform that leverages blockchain technology to provide end-to-end visibility and embedded supply chain financing for the shipping and trucking industries.
